title: t206 Johnson Hands at Chest NM+ but trimmed

posts.post_title: t206 Johnson Hands at Chest NM+ but trimmed
posts.post_content:
T206 Walter Johnson

No creases or wrinkles. This card was probably a solid 6 or 7 and somebody wanted it to look like an 8 or 9.  Bummer.  Selling for $500 OBO.  PM me if you are interested.  

[url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ojwwb584m5plhjy/T206%20Johnson%20Back.JPG?dl=0[/url]

[url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/zqs10e3kru119i7/T206%20Johnson%20Front.JPG?dl=0[/url]

PM Sent.

Had to type out the whole description in the title as "Trimmed Johnson" just didn't seem right. :D

Matt
